course.title: CSI 3131 Operating Systems (3 units)
course.desc: Principles of operating systems. Operating systems design issues. Process management, process scheduling, concurrency issues. CPU scheduling. Memory management. Virtual memory. Mass storage systems. Input/Output system. File system. Security and protection. Examples of operating systems.Course Component: Laboratory, Lecture, TutorialPrerequisites: CEG 2136, CSI 2110.
